user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable and supportive footwear that would enhance my walking experience.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to this product primarily because of its exceptional comfort and lightweight design, which I found crucial for my walking needs. The emphasis on community and environmental responsibility also resonated with me, making me feel good about my purchase.

My decision to buy this product was influenced by its reputation for comfort and quality. The detailed description of the cushioning technology and supportive design appealed to my need for a reliable walking shoe, and I appreciated the brand's commitment to meeting diverse lifestyle needs.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are made from high-quality materials and offer exceptional comfort. I value items that are durable and maintain their shape and comfort over time, such as soft fleece sweatshirts and cozy slippers. I also appreciate versatile clothing that can be worn for both casual and active settings, like comfortable pants and classic tees. Additionally, I enjoy products that provide a good fit and support, especially in footwear, as well as those that feature stylish designs or graphics. Overall, I look for items that combine comfort, quality, and practicality.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive footwear for enhanced walking experience. within my expected price range: [45.66, 95.0]
What type of footwear do you prefer for walking - shoes, sneakers, sandals, or any specific style?
I prefer walking shoes for my enhanced walking experience.
What specific features are you looking for in walking shoes to ensure they provide both comfort and support for your enhanced walking experience?

I generally prefer walking shoes that are made from high-quality materials and offer exceptional comfort. I value durable shoes that maintain their shape and support over time. I also appreciate footwear with a good fit and stylish design to wear for casual and active settings. For my current needs, I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable and supportive walking shoes that would enhance my walking experience.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Propet Mens Stability Walker Walking Walking Sneakers Athletic Shoes - Grey> / Item ID: B07C876KD2 / Price: $85.9 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Fashion Sneakers'] / Description: ['One of our most popular models, this walking shoe is designed with a wider forefoot and heel base, for the ultimate in stability. The pu insole features a heel pad and cushioning ridges for superior comfort. Features a full-grain perforated leather upper.', "Propet is a rapidly growing shoe company dedicated to making the worlds best walking shoes. Propet shoes are better walking shoes because they're designed and manufactured to be your most comfortable walking experience ever. Extra attention is paid to giving your foot support where it is needed, more cushy comfort where it counts and more room where your foot's moving parts need freedom when walking. The result has to be tried to be believed! Shouldn't you be wearing the world's best walking shoes?"] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Skechers Men's Go Walk Max-54601 Sneaker> / Item ID: B0C5M5DFPT / Price: $45.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Walking'] / Description: ["Get the maximum comfort and cushioning for athletic walking with the Skechers go walk max. Mesh fabric upper with cushioned, supportive sole design. Designed with Skechers performance technology and materials specifically for athletic walking. Goga max technology insole with high-rebound cushioning. The company's success stems from it's high quality, diversified, and affordable product line that meets consumers' Various lifestyle needs. Since it's inception in 1992, the Skechers diverse product offering has grown from utility style boots to include seven Skechers brands and five uniquely branded fashion lines for men and women. Skechers is an award-winning global leader in lifestyle footwear offering shoes that appeal to trend-savvy men, women and kids everywhere. The brand's styles include the latest innovative athletic, casual and fashion sneakers as well as sandals and boots—with many collections featuring Skechers air-cooled memory foam insoles for added comfort. Plus, Skechers offers a range of slip-resistant work FOOTWEAR for men and women, as well as cool, fun, playful and lighted styles that boys and girls love. Always ahead of the fashion curve, Skechers has made its sport, casual and dress casual shoes essential to every closet."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Propet Womens Travel Walker Ii Walking Walking Sneakers Athletic Shoes - Black> / Item ID: B007AAYWZC / Price: $59.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Walking'] / Description: ['Walking just got a whole lot easier and more comfortable with Propet’s Travel Walker II. Your feet are at their most breathable when encased in the lightweight mesh, while a synthetic leather toe and heel cap protect from wear-and-tear where it’s needed most. Super stretchy bungee lacing allows for quick and easy dressing, and a treaded rubber sole keeps you grounded even on tricky surfaces.', "Propet is a rapidly growing shoe company dedicated to making the worlds best walking shoes. Propet shoes are better walking shoes because they're designed and manufactured to be your most comfortable walking experience ever. Extra attention is paid to giving your foot support where it is needed, more cushy comfort where it counts and more room where your foot's moving parts need freedom when walking. The result has to be tried to be believed! Shouldn't you be wearing the world's best walking shoes?"]
